conversations.value:
Web search results:

[1] "For another year, Mykonos tops the list of best performers with an average gross yield of 7.4%. Paros (7.1%) is one of the destinations that was able to increase its yield compared to 2019 (6.5%). Although prices increased, rent growth outpaced sales prices resulting in a higher yield, further closing the gap with Mykonos."
URL: https://www.greekguru.net/single-post/buying-a-house-in-greece-by-the-sea-mykonos-paros-top-yields-list

[2] "7/2/2023 - Mykonos, Ano Mera: In a prominent location, an unfinished building of 490 sq.m. for rent. It is suitable for professional use either for a single business (eg supermarket) or as a mall with shops a ... €7,000/month 490m 2 €14/m 2 3 rooms Store 512 m 2 To Rent Main town - Chora (Mykonos) 7/2/2023 - Mykonos Town, Chora."
URL: https://en.spitogatos.gr/to\_rent-commercial\_properties/mykonos

[3] "Mykonos can be a delightful shopping experience, even for those on modest or nearly nonexistent budgets. After all, you can walk the big spenders mile without parting with a single cent and still feel rich with the joy of a perfectly beautiful stroll. A great point to start your expedition is the spectacular bay of Little Venice."
URL: https://www.greece-is.com/shopping-paradise-mykonos/

[4] "Indeed, the well-heeled dont come here for a dip in the sea only. The house of Fendi is one of the latest to set up shop for the coming holiday season with a temporary retail space at Nammos Village, the islands leading shopping centre. The Fendi pop-up store occupies 90 sqm. (969 sq.ft.) set across two floors of one of the open-air ..."
URL: https://superfuture.com/2022/05/new-shops/mykonos-fendi-pop-up-store/

[5] "Private Shopping Tour in Mykonos Town Fashion Shows from $109.00 per adult 3. Minima Gallery 10 Art Galleries • Art Museums By Pranaya The gallery is spread over two floors and has works by emil herker and karl albert and others as well . We had a hearty... 4. Eden Fine Art Gallery 5 Art Galleries Open now By burgsSydney"
URL: https://www.tripadvisor.com/Attractions-g189430-Activities-c26-Mykonos\_Cyclades\_South\_Aegean.html

[6] "Some of the boutiques selling the best luxury clothes you can find around here include: Enny Monaco, Louis Vuitton, Linea Piu selling Chanel, Blumarine, Ermanno Scervino, Tom Ford and Christopher Kane, Soho-Soho Mykonos sells Dior, Herve Leger, Alexander Wang and Emilio Pucci."
URL: https://www.theacevip.com/shopping-in-mykonos/

[7] "Isapera is the lesser-known but popular local brand with solid block stripes of colour. The Ancient Greek label is stocked in abundance and the stores own customisations include one-off pom-poms, charms and fringed designs. Address: 11 Mavrogeni, Chora. Telephone: +30 22890 22782. Jardin store George Messaritakis."
URL: https://www.cntraveller.com/article/shopping-in-mykonos

[8] "All kinds of shops are available in Mykonos Town, mostly gathered in the narrow whitewashed streets of the capital - souvenir shops, high-label designer clothes, and shoe shops, art galleries, and several fine jewelry stores selling beautiful creations inspired by the Greek jewels of ancient times."
URL: https://www.greeka.com/cyclades/mykonos/shopping/

[9] "Famous for its fashionable crowd, Mykonos is the kind of place where you can go shopping at midnight. The mazelike streets of Chora are filled with both posh clothing boutiques and little shops run by older ladies clad in black selling chunky wool sweaters and Greek sandals that retail for hundreds of dollars at Barneys."
URL: https://stories.forbestravelguide.com/where-to-find-the-best-shopping-in-mykonos

[10] "Mykonos is famed for its local meat specialities. Purchase fresh meat and local delicacies from one of the islandâ€™s butchers. 4 News Book Stores. Keep in touch with the rest of the world and pick up a good holiday read at one of Mykonos book shops and news stands. 5 Music DVD Stores. Buy or rent CDs and DVDs."
URL: https://www.inmykonos.com/shop-in-mykonos.html
Current date: 12/02/2023

Instructions: Using the provided web search results, write a comprehensive reply to the given query. Make sure to cite results using [[number](URL)] notation after the reference. If the provided search results refer to multiple subjects with the same name, write separate answers for each subject.
Query: yield for retail stores on Mykonos

The web search results do not mention the yield specifically for retail stores on Mykonos, but provide information on the retail scene and shops available on the island:

Mykonos: Mykonos is known for its shopping experiences, with shops selling souvenirs, designer clothing, art galleries, jewelry stores, and local brands [[8](https://www.greeka.com/cyclades/mykonos/shopping/)]. Some of the boutiques selling luxury clothing include Enny Monaco, Louis Vuitton, Linea Piu selling Chanel, Blumarine, Ermanno Scervino, Tom Ford, and Christopher Kane, Soho-Soho Mykonos sells Dior, Herve Leger, Alexander Wang, and Emilio Pucci [[6](https://www.theacevip.com/shopping-in-mykonos/)]. Mykonos is also known for its local meat specialties and bookstores, among others [[10](https://www.inmykonos.com/shop-in-mykonos.html)].
